columns.name: InsertId
columns.description: A unique identifier for the log entry.

columns.name: LogName
columns.description: The full log name including resource path.

columns.name: ReceiveTimestamp
columns.description: Time the log entry was received by Cloud Logging.

columns.name: Operation
columns.description: Contains details about the operation being performed, including the operation ID, producer, and status information.

columns.name: ProtoPayload
columns.description: Holds the structured audit log data, including authentication, method name, resource name, and service-specific information.

columns.name: Resource
columns.description: Describes the resource associated with the log entry, including labels and resource type.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: Indicates the severity level of the log entry or event

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp indicating when the log entry was created or received.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The original timestamp of the event as recorded by the source system.
